trans-unit.source: Provides a simple, programmatically controlled HTTP protocol listener.
This class cannot be inherited.
Using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> class, you can create a simple HTTP protocol listener that responds to HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>类，你可以创建一个响应 HTTP 请求的简单 HTTP 协议侦听器。

trans-unit.source: The listener is active for the lifetime of the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object and runs within your application with its permissions.
trans-unit.target: 侦听器处于活动状态的生存期内<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>对象，并使用其权限的应用程序中运行。

trans-unit.source: To use <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>, create a new instance of the class using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> constructor and use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A> property to gain access to the collection that holds the strings that specify which Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefixes the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> should process.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>，创建的类使用的新实例<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>构造函数，并使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A>属性来访问保留指定的统一资源标识符 (URI) 的字符串的集合前缀<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>应处理。

trans-unit.source: A URI prefix string is composed of a scheme (http or https), a host, an optional port, and an optional path.
trans-unit.target: URI 的前缀字符串组成的方案 （http 或 https）、 主机、 一个可选端口和一个可选路径。

trans-unit.source: An example of a complete prefix string is *http://www.contoso.com:8080/customerData/*.
trans-unit.target: 完整的前缀字符串的一个示例是* http://www.contoso.com:8080/customerData/ *。

trans-unit.source: Prefixes must end in a forward slash ("/").
trans-unit.target: 前缀必须以正斜杠 （"/"） 结尾。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object with the prefix that most closely matches a requested URI responds to the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>最匹配所请求的 URI 前缀的对象的请求作出响应。

trans-unit.source: Multiple <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> objects cannot add the same prefix; a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception> exception is thrown if a <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> adds a prefix that is already in use.
trans-unit.target: 多个<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>对象不能添加相同的前缀;<xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception>如果引发异常<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>会添加前缀中已被使用。

trans-unit.source: When a port is specified, the host element can be replaced with "\*" to indicate that the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> accepts requests sent to the port if the requested URI does not match any other prefix.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个端口时，主机元素可以被替换为"\*"，则指示<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>接受请求发送到端口，如果请求的 URI 与任何其他前缀不匹配。

trans-unit.source: For example, to receive all requests sent to port 8080 when the requested URI is not handled by any <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>, the prefix is *http://\*:8080/*.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要接收所有请求发送到端口 8080 时任何未处理请求的 URI <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>，该前缀是*http://\*: 8080 /*。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, to specify that the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> accepts all requests sent to a port, replace the host element with the "+" character.
trans-unit.target: 同样，若要指定<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>接受所有请求都发送到端口，将替换为"+"字符的宿主元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, *https://+:8080*.
trans-unit.target: For example, *https://+:8080*.

trans-unit.source: The "\*" and "+" characters can be present in prefixes that include paths.
trans-unit.target: "\*"和"+"字符可出现在包含路径的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Starting with .NET Core 2.0 or .NET Framework 4.6 on Windows 10, wildcard subdomains are supported in URI prefixes that are managed by an <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET 核心 2.0 或 Windows 10 上的.NET Framework 4.6 开始，在 URI 的前缀中管理的支持通配符子域<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>对象。

trans-unit.source: To specify a wildcard subdomain, use the "\*" character as part of the hostname in a URI prefix.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定通配符子域，使用"\*"中的 URI 前缀的主机名的一部分的字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, *http://\*.foo.com/*.
trans-unit.target: 例如， *http://\*.foo.com/*。

trans-unit.source: Pass this as the argument to the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 将作为自变量传递<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This works as of .NET Core 2.0 or .NET Framework 4.6 on Windows 10; in earlier versions, this generates an <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerException>.
trans-unit.target: 之所以能够从.NET 核心 2.0 或 Windows 10; 上的.NET Framework 4.6 开始在早期版本，这会生成<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerException>。

trans-unit.source: Top-level wildcard bindings (*http://\*:8080/* and *http://+:8080*) should **not** be used.
Top-level wildcard bindings can open up your app to security vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: 顶级通配符绑定可能会为应用带来安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: This applies to both strong and weak wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 此行为同时适用于强通配符和弱通配符。

trans-unit.source: Use explicit host names rather than wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 使用显式主机名而不是通配符。

trans-unit.source: Subdomain wildcard binding (for example, `*.mysub.com`) doesn't have this security risk if you control the entire parent domain (as opposed to `*.com`, which is vulnerable).
trans-unit.target: 如果可控制整个父域（区别于易受攻击的 `*.com`），则子域通配符绑定（例如，`*.mysub.com`）不具有此安全风险。

trans-unit.source: See [rfc7230 section-5.4](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7230#section-5.4) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [rfc7230 第 5.4 条](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7230#section-5.4)。

trans-unit.source: To begin listening for requests from clients, add the URI prefixes to the collection and call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要开始侦听来自客户端的请求，请将的 URI 前缀添加到集合，并且调用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> offers both synchronous and asynchronous models for processing client requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> 提供用于处理客户端请求的同步和异步模型。

trans-unit.source: Requests and their associated responses are accessed using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext> object returned by the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A> method or its asynchronous counterparts, the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A> and <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 请求和其关联的响应使用访问<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext>返回对象<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A>方法或其异步对应<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A>和<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The synchronous model is appropriate if your application should block while waiting for a client request and if you want to process only one request at a time.
trans-unit.target: 同步模型适合，如果你的应用程序应阻止等待客户端请求时，如果你想要一次处理只请求一次。

trans-unit.source: Using the synchronous model, call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A> method, which waits for a client to send a request.
trans-unit.target: 使用同步模型，调用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A>方法，等待客户端发送请求。

trans-unit.source: The method returns an <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext> object to you for processing when one occurs.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext>对象为你处理一个发生。

trans-unit.source: In the more complex asynchronous model, your application does not block while waiting for requests and each request is processed in its own execution thread.
trans-unit.target: 在更复杂的异步模型中，你的应用程序不会阻止在其自己的执行线程中等待请求和每个请求正在处理。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A> method to specify an application-defined method to be called for each incoming request.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A>方法，以指定的应用程序定义一个方法调用每个传入请求。

trans-unit.source: Within that method, call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A> method to obtain the request, process it, and respond.
trans-unit.target: 在该方法中，调用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A>方法以获取请求，处理请求和响应。

trans-unit.source: In either model, incoming requests are accessed using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.Request%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property and are represented by <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest> objects.
trans-unit.target: 在任一模型中，使用访问传入的请求<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.Request%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性和是否由表示<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest>对象。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, responses are accessed using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.Response%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property and are represented by <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse> objects.
trans-unit.target: 同样，使用访问响应<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.Response%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性和是否由表示<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse>对象。

trans-unit.source: These objects share some functionality with the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse> objects, but the latter objects cannot be used in conjunction with <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> because they implement client, not server, behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 这些对象共享某些功能，带有<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse>对象，但后者的对象不能与一起<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>因为它们实现客户端、 不是服务器、 行为。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> can require client authentication.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>可以要求客户端身份验证。

trans-unit.source: You can either specify a particular scheme to use for authentication, or you can specify a delegate that determines the scheme to use.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定一种特定的方案，用于进行身份验证，也可以指定一个委托来决定要使用的方案。

trans-unit.source: You must require some form of authentication to obtain information about the client's identity.
trans-unit.target: 你必须要求某种形式的身份验证来获取有关客户端的标识信息。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.User%2A>, <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemes%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关其他信息，请参阅<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.User%2A>， <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemes%2A>，和<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you create an <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> using https, you must select a Server Certificate for that listener.
trans-unit.target: 如果你创建<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>使用 https，你必须为该侦听器选择服务器证书。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> query of this <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> will fail with an unexpected close of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>此查询<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>并意外关闭的连接将失败。

trans-unit.source: You can configure Server Certificates and other listener options by using Network Shell (netsh.exe).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 Network Shell (netsh.exe) 来配置服务器证书和其他侦听器选项。

trans-unit.source: See [Network Shell (Netsh)](/windows-server/networking/technologies/netsh/netsh) for more details.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[Network Shell (Netsh)](/windows-server/networking/technologies/netsh/netsh)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The executable began shipping with Windows Server 2008 and Windows Vista.
trans-unit.target: 可执行文件开始使用 Windows Server 2008 和 Windows Vista 的传送。

trans-unit.source: If you specify multiple authentication schemes for the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>, the listener will challenge clients in the following order: `Negotiate`, `NTLM`, `Digest`, and then `Basic`.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定多个身份验证方案<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>，侦听器将请求客户端按以下顺序： `Negotiate`， `NTLM`， `Digest`，，然后`Basic`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using a <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> class.
Before using the instance returned by this constructor, you must invoke its <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在使用此构造函数返回的实例之前, 必须调用其<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> constructor to create a new <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>构造函数来创建一个新<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>对象。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> class topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整示例，请参阅<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>类主题。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used on the current operating system.
Windows Server 2003 or Windows XP SP2 is required to use instances of this class.
Note: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 注意： 此成员将输出跟踪信息时您的应用程序中启用网络跟踪。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: Shuts down the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> object immediately, discarding all currently queued requests.
This method disposes of all resources held by this listener.
trans-unit.target: 此方法释放该侦听器持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: Any pending requests are unable to complete.
trans-unit.target: 任何挂起的请求将无法完成。

trans-unit.source: After calling this method, you will receive an <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException> if you attempt to use this <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法后，你将收到<xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>如果你尝试使用此<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scheme used to authenticate clients.
A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes" /> enumeration values that indicates how clients are to be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 指示如何对客户端进行身份验证的 <see cref="T:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes" /> 枚举值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes.Anonymous" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes.Anonymous" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> uses the specified scheme to authenticate all incoming requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>使用指定的方案所有传入的请求进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A> and <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A> methods return an incoming client request only if the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> successfully authenticates the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A>和<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A>方法返回传入的客户端请求，仅当<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>成功进行身份验证请求。

trans-unit.source: You can interrogate the identity of a successfully authenticated client by using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用询问成功通过身份验证的客户端的标识<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you want an <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object to use different authentication mechanisms based on characteristics of the requests it receives (for example, the request's <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.Url%2A> or <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.UserHostName%2A> property), you must implement a method that chooses the authentication scheme.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>根据它接收的请求的特征对象使用不同的身份验证机制 (例如，请求的<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.Url%2A>或<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.UserHostName%2A>属性)，则必须实现的方法，选择身份验证方案。

trans-unit.source: For instructions about how to do this, see the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate%2A> property documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何执行此操作的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate%2A>属性文档。

trans-unit.source: To set this property to enable Digest, NTLM, or Negotiate requires the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPrincipal>.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置此属性以启用摘要，NTLM 或协商需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPrincipal>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemes%2A> property to specify an authentication scheme.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemes%2A>属性来指定身份验证方案。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
Gets or sets the delegate called to determine the protocol used to authenticate clients.
An <see cref="T:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemeSelector" /> delegate that invokes the method used to select an authentication protocol.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemeSelector" /> 委托，它调用用于选择身份验证协议的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If you want the same authentication protocol to be used for all requests handled by a particular instance of <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>, you do not need to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要用于处理由的特定实例的所有请求的相同身份验证协议<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>，不需要设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a protocol to be used for all client requests, use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要用于所有客户端请求的协议，使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the client has not specified authentication information in its headers, the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> calls the specified delegate for each unauthenticated incoming request to determine which, if any, protocol to use to authenticate the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端未在其标头，指定身份验证信息<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>调用为每个未经身份验证的传入请求，以确定，如果有的话，使用协议进行身份验证客户端指定的委托。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A> and <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A> methods return an incoming request only if the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> successfully authenticated the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A>和<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A>方法返回传入的请求仅当<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>成功通过身份验证请求。

trans-unit.source: If a request cannot be authenticated, the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> automatically sends back a 401 response.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法对请求进行身份验证，<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>自动发回 401 响应。

trans-unit.source: You can get the identity of a successfully authenticated client using the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.LogonUserIdentity%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用已成功经过身份验证客户端的标识<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.LogonUserIdentity%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The ability to delegate the choice of authentication protocol to an application-specific method is useful if you want an instance of <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> to use different authentication protocols depending on the characteristics of the requests it receives (for example, the request's <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.Url%2A> or <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.UserHostAddress%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 委托所选的身份验证协议为应用程序特定方法的能力是如果你希望的实例大小时<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>使用不同的身份验证协议根据它接收 （对于请求的特性例如，请求的<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.Url%2A>或<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.UserHostAddress%2A>属性)。

trans-unit.source: To set this property to enable Digest, NTLM, or Negotiate requires the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPrincipal>.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置此属性以启用摘要，NTLM 或协商需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPrincipal>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides an implementation of a method invoked by an <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemeSelector> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例提供的方法由调用实现<xref:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemeSelector>委托。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when a client request is available.
A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.
This object is passed to the <c>callback</c> delegate when the operation completes.
Begins asynchronously retrieving an incoming request.
An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that indicates the status of the asynchronous operation.
The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A> method begins an asynchronous (non-blocking) call to receive incoming client requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A>方法开始异步 （非阻塞） 调用接收传入的客户端请求。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you must call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> method and add at least one Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefix to listen for by adding the URI strings to the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前，必须调用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>方法并添加至少一个统一资源标识符 (URI) 前缀，用于侦听的 URI 将字符串添加到<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection>返回<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 必须通过调用完成异步操作<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`callback`委托。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 在操作完成时，此方法不会阻止。

trans-unit.source: To get an incoming request and block until the operation completes, call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取传入的请求和块，该操作完成之前，调用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)
trans-unit.target: 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A> method to specify a callback method that will handle incoming client requests.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A>方法，以指定将处理传入的客户端请求的回调方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example implements a callback method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例实现一个回调方法。

trans-unit.source: A Win32 function call failed.
Check the exception's <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode" /> property to determine the cause of the exception.
This object has not been started or is currently stopped.
This object is closed.
This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: Shuts down the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" />.
After calling this method, you can no longer use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法后，你无法再使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>对象。

trans-unit.source: To temporarily pause an <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object, use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Stop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要临时暂停<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>对象，请使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Stop%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method shut downs the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object without processing queued requests.
trans-unit.target: 此方法关闭列表<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>而不会处理排队的请求的对象。

trans-unit.source: Any pending requests are unable to complete.
trans-unit.target: 任何挂起的请求将无法完成。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a default list of Service Provider Names (SPNs) as determined by registered prefixes.
A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection" /> that contains a list of SPNs.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含 SPN 列表的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.DefaultServiceNames%2A> property is used with integrated Windows authentication to provide extended protection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.DefaultServiceNames%2A>属性用于使用集成 Windows 身份验证提供扩展的保护。

trans-unit.source: The list of SPNs is initialized from the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A> property when accessed and cleared when new prefixes are added to the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Spn 的列表初始化从<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A>属性时访问和清除在将新的前缀添加到<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.DefaultServiceNames%2A> property is used if an application doesn't set the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A> property on its extended protection policy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.DefaultServiceNames%2A>应用程序不设置，才使用属性<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A>上其扩展的保护策略的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection> that is retrieved with the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.DefaultServiceNames%2A> property is built from the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A> property according to the following rules:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection> ，检索与<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.DefaultServiceNames%2A>从生成属性<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A>属性根据下列规则：

trans-unit.source: If the hostname is "+", "*", or an IPv4 or IPv6 literal (equivalent to "\*" but restricted to a specific local interface), the following SPN is added:
trans-unit.target: 如果主机名是"+"，"*"，或 IPv4 或 IPv6 文本 (等效于"\*"但限制为特定的本地接口)，添加以下 SPN:

trans-unit.source: `"HTTP/"` plus the fully qualified domain name of the computer.
trans-unit.target: `"HTTP/"` 加上的计算机的完全限定的域名。

trans-unit.source: If the hostname contains no dots (no domains or subdomains), an attempt is made to resolve the fully-qualified domain name using DNS (the same behavior used by <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>).
trans-unit.target: 如果主机名不包含点 （没有域或子域），尝试解析使用 DNS 完全限定的域名称 (相同的行为由<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>)。

trans-unit.source: If the fully-qualified domain name can be resolved, the following SPNs are added:
trans-unit.target: 如果可以解析的完全限定域名，则添加以下 Spn:

trans-unit.source: `"HTTP/"` plus the hostname (the short name).
trans-unit.target: `"HTTP/"` 加上的主机名 （短名称）。

trans-unit.source: `"HTTP/"` plus the fully qualified domain name for the hostname.
trans-unit.target: `"HTTP/"` 加上为此主机名的完全限定的域名。

trans-unit.source: If the hostname contains not dots (no domains or subdomains) and a fully-qualified domain name can't be resolved, the following SPN is added:
trans-unit.target: 如果主机名不包含点 （没有域或子域） 和无法解析的完全限定域名，将添加以下 SPN:

trans-unit.source: `"HTTP/"` plus the hostname.
trans-unit.target: `"HTTP/"` 加上主机名。

trans-unit.source: If the hostname contains dots (domains or subdomains), the following SPN is added:
trans-unit.target: 如果主机名中包含点 （域或子域），将添加以下 SPN:

trans-unit.source: `"HTTP/"` plus the hostname.
trans-unit.target: `"HTTP/"` 加上主机名。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.DefaultServiceNames%2A> property can be used by an application to review the list of default SPNs which will be used for authentication if no custom list is supplied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.DefaultServiceNames%2A>属性可以使用应用程序，查看默认 Spn 将用于身份验证如果不提供任何自定义列表的列表。

trans-unit.source: If other SPNs are needed, an application can add them using one of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection.Merge%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要其他 Spn，则应用程序可以添加它们使用之一<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection.Merge%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It is not safe when using extended protection to make policy decisions based on the requested URL, since this can be spoofed.
trans-unit.target: 使用扩展的保护策略基于做出决策所请求的 URL，因为这可以被欺骗时，它是不安全的。

trans-unit.source: Rather, applications should rely on the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.LocalEndPoint%2A> or <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.RemoteEndPoint%2A> properties to make such policy decisions.
trans-unit.target: 相反，应用程序应依赖于<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.LocalEndPoint%2A>或<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.RemoteEndPoint%2A>属性以使此类策略决策。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that was obtained when the asynchronous operation was started.
Completes an asynchronous operation to retrieve an incoming client request.
An <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListenerContext" /> object that represents the client request.

The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A> method is called, usually within an application-defined callback method invoked by a delegate, to obtain the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext> object that contains an incoming client request and its associated response.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A>调用方法时，通常在应用程序定义的回调方法中调用的委托，以获取<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext>对象，其中包含传入的客户端请求和其关联的响应。

trans-unit.source: This method completes an operation previously started by calling the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法完成以前通过调用启动操作<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the operation has not completed, this method blocks until it does.
trans-unit.target: 如果该操作未完成，此方法阻止，直至它执行。

trans-unit.source: Because calling the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A> method requires the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object, this object is typically passed into a callback method by using the state object passed into the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因为调用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A>方法需要<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>对象，此对象通常传递到回调方法，从而使用传入的状态对象<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain this state object by using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property of the `asyncResult` object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用来获取此状态对象<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>属性`asyncResult`对象。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)
trans-unit.target: 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the implementation of a callback method that calls the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示调用的回调方法的实现<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not obtained by calling the <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
<paramref name="asyncResult" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method was already called for the specified <paramref name="asyncResult" /> object.
This object is closed.
This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: Get or set the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> to use for extended protection for a session.
A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> that specifies the policy to use for extended protection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />，它指定要用于扩展保护的策略。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy%2A> property is used with integrated Windows authentication to provide extended protection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy%2A>属性用于使用集成 Windows 身份验证提供扩展的保护。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy%2A> property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy for the whole <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy%2A>属性允许的整个的扩展的保护策略配置<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>会话。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate%2A> property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy for each individual request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate%2A>属性允许的每个请求的扩展的保护策略的配置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A> property must be `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A>属性必须为`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> instance gets the Channel Binding Token (CBT) directly from its own TLS session if there is one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>实例在如果还有一个直接从其自己的 TLS 会话获取通道绑定令牌 (CBT)。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> property, but the <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding" /> property was not <see langword="null" />.
An attempt was made to set the <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> property to <see langword="null" />.
An attempt was made to set the <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> property after the <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpListener.Start" /> method was already called.
This object is closed.

The <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement" /> property was set to <see cref="F:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Always" /> on a platform that does not support extended protection.
Get or set the delegate called to determine the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> to use for each request.
A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> that specifies the policy to use for extended protection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />，它指定要用于扩展保护的策略。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy%2A> property is used with integrated Windows authentication to provide extended protection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy%2A>属性用于使用集成 Windows 身份验证提供扩展的保护。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy%2A> property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy for the whole <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy%2A>属性允许的整个的扩展的保护策略配置<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>会话。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate%2A> property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy per individual request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate%2A>属性允许的每个单个请求的扩展的保护策略配置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A> property must be `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A>属性必须为`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> instance gets the Channel Binding Token (CBT) directly from its own TLS session if there is one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>实例在如果还有一个直接从其自己的 TLS 会话获取通道绑定令牌 (CBT)。

trans-unit.source: For each request, the delegate can choose the settings that the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> instance will use to provide extended protection.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个请求，该委托可以选择的设置，<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>实例将用于提供扩展的保护。

trans-unit.source: If a delegate returns `null` for this property, this represents a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> which the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>.
trans-unit.target: 如果委托返回`null`对于此属性，这表示<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>其中<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate" /> property, but the <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding" /> property must be <see langword="null" />.
An attempt was made to set the <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate" /> property to <see langword="null" />.
An attempt was made to set the <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate" /> property after the <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpListener.Start" /> method was already called.
This object is closed.
An attempt was made to set the <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate" /> property on a platform that does not support extended protection.
Waits for an incoming request and returns when one is received.
An <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListenerContext" /> object that represents a client request.

Before calling this method, you must call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> method and add at least one URI prefix to listen for by adding the URI strings to the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前，必须调用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>方法并添加至少一个用于侦听的 URI 将字符串添加到的 URI 前缀<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection>返回<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of prefixes, see the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 前缀的详细说明，请参阅<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>类概述。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while waiting for an incoming request.
trans-unit.target: 等待传入的请求时此方法阻止。

trans-unit.source: If you want incoming requests to be processed asynchronously (on separate threads) so that your application does not block, use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要处理以异步方式 （在单独的线程），以便你的应用程序不会阻止传入请求，使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: A Win32 function call failed.
Check the exception's <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode" /> property to determine the cause of the exception.
This object has not been started or is currently stopped.
-or-
The <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> does not have any Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefixes to respond to.
This object is closed.
This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: Waits for an incoming request as an asynchronous operation.
Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> property on the task object returns an <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListenerContext" /> object that represents a client request.
This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 不会阻止此操作。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete when the incoming request has been received.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>对象完成后将收到传入的请求。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you must call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> method and add at least one URI prefix to listen for by adding the URI strings to the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前，必须调用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>方法并添加至少一个用于侦听的 URI 将字符串添加到的 URI 前缀<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection>返回<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of prefixes, see the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 前缀的详细说明，请参阅<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether your application receives exceptions that occur when an <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> sends the response to the client.
<see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> should not return exceptions that occur when sending the response to the client; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 不返回向客户端发送响应时发生的异常，则返回 <see langword="true" />；否则返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` if your application does not require that a response is successfully sent to each client.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为`true`如果你的应用程序不需要响应成功发送到每个客户端。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> has been started.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> was started; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启动 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To start an <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>, call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要启动<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>，调用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using this property to determine the listening state of an instance.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性以确定实例的侦听状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> can be used with the current operating system.
<see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果支持 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This class is available only on computers running the Windows XP SP2 or Windows Server 2003 operating systems.
trans-unit.target: 此类是仅在运行 Windows XP SP2 或 Windows Server 2003 操作系统的系统的计算机上可用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.IsSupported%2A> property to detect whether an <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object can be used with the current operating system.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.IsSupported%2A>属性来检测是否<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>对象可以用于当前操作系统。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefixes handled by this <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection" /> that contains the URI prefixes that this <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> object is configured to handle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection" />，包含此 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 对象在经配置后要处理的 URI 前缀。

trans-unit.source: The prefixes are in canonical form.
trans-unit.target: 前缀是采用规范格式。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of prefixes, see the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 前缀的详细说明，请参阅<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A> property to obtain and print the URI prefixes that are handled.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A>属性来获取和打印处理的 URI 前缀。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
Gets or sets the realm, or resource partition, associated with this <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> value that contains the name of the realm associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，包含与 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 对象关联的领域名。

trans-unit.source: Servers use realms to partition protected resources; each partition can have its own authentication scheme and/or authorization database.
trans-unit.target: 服务器使用领域进行分区受保护的资源;每个分区可以有其自己的身份验证方案和/或授权数据库。

trans-unit.source: Realms are used only for basic and digest authentication.
trans-unit.target: 领域仅用于基本和摘要式身份验证。

trans-unit.source: After a client successfully authenticates, the authentication is valid for all resources in a given realm.
trans-unit.target: 在客户端成功进行身份验证之后，该身份验证对给定领域内的所有资源都有效。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of realms, see RFC 2617 at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org).
trans-unit.target: 有关领域的详细说明，请参阅在 RFC 2617 [ http://www.ietf.org ](http://www.ietf.org)。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> has only one associated realm.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>具有只有一个关联的领域。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Realm%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Realm%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
Allows this instance to receive incoming requests.
This method must be called before you call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A> or <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用此方法，然后才能调用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A>或<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After you have started an <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object, you can use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Stop%2A> method to stop it.
trans-unit.target: 已启动之后<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>对象时，可以使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Stop%2A>方法来停止它。

trans-unit.source: If this listener instance uses https, you must install and select a Server Certificate.
trans-unit.target: 如果此侦听器实例使用 https，你必须安装并选择服务器证书。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> query of this <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> will fail with an unexpected close of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>此查询<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>并意外关闭的连接将失败。

trans-unit.source: You can configure Server Certificates and other listener options by using HttpCfg.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用 HttpCfg.exe 配置服务器证书和其他侦听器选项。

trans-unit.source: See [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp) for more details.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> method to begin processing incoming requests.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>方法，以开始处理传入请求。

trans-unit.source: A Win32 function call failed.
Check the exception's <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode" /> property to determine the cause of the exception.
This object is closed.
This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to stop receiving incoming requests.
If this instance is already stopped, calling this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果此实例已停止，调用此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: After you have stopped an <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object, you can use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> method to restart it.
trans-unit.target: 已停止后<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>对象时，可以使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>方法重新启动它。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Stop%2A> method to stop processing incoming requests.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Stop%2A>方法来停止处理传入请求。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources held by this <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> object.
Applications should use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Close%2A> method instead of calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Close%2A>而不是调用此方法的方法。

trans-unit.source: The timeout manager for this <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> instance.
Returns <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListenerTimeoutManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListenerTimeoutManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The timeout manager for this <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 实例的超时管理器。

trans-unit.source: The timeout manager defines the connection timeout limits for this <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> instance.
trans-unit.target: 超时管理器定义的连接超时限制此<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that controls whether, when NTLM is used, additional requests using the same Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connection are required to authenticate.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity" /> of the first request will be used for subsequent requests on the same connection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个请求的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity" /> 将用于同一连接上的后续请求，则返回 <see langword="true" />；否则返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true` and the first request over a particular TCP connection is authenticated using NTLM, subsequent requests over the same TCP connection are processed using the authentication information (<xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>) of the initial request.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`和通过特定的 TCP 连接的第一个请求进行身份验证使用 NTLM，处理通过相同的 TCP 连接的后续请求使用的身份验证信息 (<xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>) 的初始请求。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect when NTLM is not the authentication protocol.
trans-unit.target: 此属性在 NTLM 不是身份验证协议时无效。

trans-unit.source: When Negotiate is specified as the authentication protocol, this property has an effect only if NTLM is the actual protocol used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 当 Negotiate 指定为身份验证协议时，此属性仅当 NTLM 是用于身份验证的实际协议时，才有意义。

trans-unit.source: While setting this property to `true` increases performance because the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> does not send additional NTLM authentication challenges, there is a security risk in not requiring all requests to provide authentication information.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为时`true`提高性能，因为<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>不发送其他 NTLM 身份验证质询，则不需要提供身份验证信息的所有请求中有安全风险。

trans-unit.source: You must determine whether the increase in performance is worth this risk.
trans-unit.target: 必须确定为提高性能冒此风险是否值得。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
